Apps

Check out my apps and games on the App Store and stay tunned for next releases.


Controlly

Use a game controller as a rich-featured remote control for Mac. Controlly was featured on 9to5Mac, MacRumors, iMore and iDownloadBlog, among others.

Download Controlly


El Trackpad

Transform your iPhone or iPad into a full-featured Mac trackpad with gestures support. El Trackpad was featured on 9to5Mac, Redmond Pie, MacMagazine and more.

Download El Trackpad


Aster

Space simulation game that challenges the player to use the gravity of planets to travel. Aster was featured twice on the App Store: story 1 and story 2.

Download Aster


Splool

Infinite running game in which the player rides floats through dangerous water slides.

Download Splool


Rami

App that motivates users to complete tasks in the areas of health, productivity and fun.

Download Rami


Swift as the Wind

Sailing game in which the user needs to guide a boat using only the wind.

Download Swift as the Wind


Amazing Maze

Game in which the player has to escape from a storm inside an infinite maze.

Download Amazing Maze


Zip Zap

File manager for iOS with zip and unzip support.

Download Zip Zap


Other Projects

Magic Aligner

Sketch plugin that align objects by their centers of mass. Magic Aligner automates optical adjustments in many cases. Check out the blog post I wrote about it.

Download Magic Aligner
